greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of unimodal functions f:[n]->[k*n]; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 0..140, flattened
mathematica: A[n_, k_] := If[n==0, 1, Sum[Binomial[n + 2j - 1, 2j], {j, 0, k n - 1}]];
Table[Table[A[n, d - n], {n, 0, d}], {d, 0, 10}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 20 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 23 2013
